snippet: One of Sol LeWitt’s vast wall drawings will be installed in the lobby of the Jewish Community Center on the Upper West Side of Manhattan.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; mural by Sol LeWitt will be installed in lobby of Jewish Community Center, artist's 20th wall work in public space in New York; series of trees cast in bronze by Giuseppe Penone are on view in the formal gardens of Versailles, and Penone plans to install similar work in Manhattan's Madison square park; Massachusetts Institute of Technology is offering audio tour of its campus public art works to visitors.
lead_paragraph: One of Sol LeWitt’s vast wall drawings will be installed in the lobby of the Jewish Community Center on the Upper West Side of Manhattan.

headline.main: Sol LeWitt Wall Drawing Will Unfurl in Uptown Manhattan
headline.print_headline: Sol LeWitt Wall Drawing Will Unfurl in Uptown Manhattan
